name: Issued Stock Ledger
query:
select
sle.posting_date as "Date::120",
sle.item_code as "Item Code::100",
sed.item_name as "Item Name::180",
sed.stock_uom as "Stock UOM::120",
IFNULL((select sl.actual_qty from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sl where sl.name = sle.name and sl.actual_qty > 0),0) as "IN Qty:Float:100",
IFNULL((select sl.actual_qty from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sl where sl.name = sle.name and sl.actual_qty < 0),0) as "OUT Qty:Float:100",
sle.qty_after_transaction as "Balance Qty::150",
sle.voucher_no as "Voucher No:Link/Stock Entry:150",
sed.issued_to as "Issued To::80",
sle.warehouse as "Warehouse::100"
from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sed
on sle.voucher_detail_no = sed.name
where sle.posting_date>= %(from_date)s and sle.posting_date<= %(to_date)s 
and sle.voucher_type = "Stock Entry" and sle.company = %(company)s
order by sle.posting_date asc,sle.posting_time asc
